title: Pure Burrito
typeOfFood: American, Fast food, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Tex-Mex, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Quick service place offering build-your-own burrito from a large assortment of organic and GMO-free ingredients. Tell the server if you are vegan and s/he will guide you through what's suitable. Reported that guacamole here is not vegan, Sep 2014.
